Name: PlanCoherenceVerifier
Purpose: Validate that the final investment plan is logically consistent with all previously elicited parameters (risk tolerance, time horizon, cash flow needs, emergency fund status, and emotional constraints) before locking in a single strategy.
Deliverables: A structured set of boolean and graded coherence flags (e.g., {"risk_alignment_ok": true, "liquidity_ok": false, "complexity_within_tolerance": true}) plus a minimal list of specific inconsistencies that must be resolved before finalizing the plan.
Strengths: Effective at detecting contradictions between user parameters and the proposed strategy; good at ensuring that no prior hard constraints are violated; strong at reducing hidden mismatches that would later undermine confidence in the plan.
Watch-out: Fails when prior inputs are incomplete, self-contradictory, or have changed without being updated; cannot generate a plan from scratch, only evaluate coherence of an existing candidate; must avoid discussing product recommendations, tax optimization, app UX, or emotional coaching beyond flagging logical inconsistencies.
